references.paper_title: Human few-shot learning of compositional instructions
references.reason: This paper introduces the concept of compositional instructions, which is fundamental to the few-shot learning approach in this paper.
This paper introduces the concept of Maximum Entropy Inverse Reinforcement Learning (IRL), which is relevant to the few-shot learning methods discussed in the paper.
This paper provides algorithms for IRL, which are directly relevant to the problem of learning from demonstrations.

references.paper_title: An image is worth one word: Personalizing text-to-image generation using textual inversion
references.reason: This paper demonstrates the use of frozen generative models for few-shot visual concept learning, a technique that is also used in the current paper.

references.paper_title: Unsupervised compositional concepts discovery with text-to-image generative models
references.reason: This paper shows the use of generative modeling for learning visual concept compositions, which is directly relevant to the problem of learning task compositions.
